title: Commending the Paumanacke Garden Club upon the occasion of its designation as recipient of the Organization of the Year Award
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION  commending  the Paumanacke Garden Club upon the
occasion of its designation as recipient of the Organization of the Year
Award by the Wantagh Chamber of Commerce on January 26, 2011

WHEREAS, It is the custom of this Legislative Body to honor those illus-
trious individuals and institutions of  the  State  of  New  York  whose
purposeful  endeavors  serve  to  enhance  the  quality of life in their
communities; and
  WHEREAS, Attendant to such concern, and in full accord with its  long-
standing  traditions,  this  Legislative Body is justly proud to commend
the Paumanacke Garden Club upon  the  occasion  of  its  designation  as
recipient  of  the Organization of the Year Award by the Wantagh Chamber
of Commerce; and
  WHEREAS, The Paumanacke Garden Club will be recognized at the  Wantagh
Chamber  of  Commerce's  Annual  Installation Dinner Dance to be held on
Wednesday, January 26, 2011, at Mulcahy's in Wantagh, New York; and
  WHEREAS, Accepting this most prestigious honor on behalf of Paumanacke
Garden Club will be its President, Loretta Lentini; and
  WHEREAS, It is  with  great  admiration  that  this  Legislative  Body
applauds  the  efforts  of  all  the  individuals involved in this vital
organization, and to recognize their unwavering  devotion  to  improving
the quality of life for others; and
  WHEREAS,  Throughout  its distinguished history, the Paumanacke Garden
Club has diligently served the residents of Wantagh, New York,  and  its
surrounding  communities;  it  has  made  a  difference in every life it
touches and has had a positive impact throughout the entire region; and
  WHEREAS, It is the sense of this Legislative Body that when  organiza-
tions  of  such noble aims and accomplishments are brought to our atten-
tion, they should be celebrated and recognized by all  the  citizens  of
the great State of New York; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED,  That  this  Legislative  Body pause in its deliberations to
commend the Paumanacke Garden Club upon the occasion of its  designation
as  recipient of the Organization of the Year Award by the Wantagh Cham-
ber of Commerce; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to the Paumanacke Garden Club.
